fields.name: Summer Rain
fields.description: Summer Rain signals a reset – channelling a particular sense of freedom, the magic of summer.
fields.characteristics: Suitable for small and medium-sized rooms. Fragrance gradually released and persistent (optimal after around 20 minutes). There is no limit on the size of the space as long as you keep an eye on the candle. Volume: 190g. Burning time: around 50 hours. Size: height 9cm; diameter 7,7cm.
fields.ingredients: Basil Egypt Essential Oil, Spearmint Italy Essential Oil, Green Fig, Ginger Nigeria, Sandalwood, Tonka Beans
